tokens.text: validates texture references and handle limits

title: Texture Validation
description: Validates texture references across entities, blocks, items, particles, and UI elements. Tracks texture handle usage to prevent exceeding platform limits.

fields.title: Handle Limit Exceeded
fields.description: Error when the total number of unique texture handles exceeds platform limits. Mobile devices have lower limits than PC. Consider consolidating textures or using texture atlases.
fields.howToUse: Reduce the number of unique textures by combining small textures into texture atlases. Consider using flipbook animations instead of separate texture files. Remove unused textures from your pack.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the count of texture handles exceeding the limit

fields.title: Textures
fields.description: Count of unique texture paths referenced in the project from entities, blocks, items, particles, terrain_texture.json, and UI definitions.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the count of unique texture references
